events.description: Ronald Acuna Jr. singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Edward Olivares.
Matt Olson homers (5) on a fly ball to left field. Ronald Acuna Jr. scores.
Austin Riley homers (3) on a fly ball to left field.
Sean Murphy strikes out swinging. 1 out
Injury Delay.
Eddie Rosario doubles (3) on a sharp line drive to center fielder Kyle Isbel.
Ozzie Albies strikes out swinging. 2 outs
Vaughn Grissom doubles (1) on a ground ball to right fielder MJ Melendez. Eddie Rosario scores.

MJ Melendez doubles (4) on a ground ball to right fielder Ronald Acuna Jr.
Bobby Witt Jr. singles on a ground ball to shortstop Vaughn Grissom.

Vinnie Pasquantino grounds into a force out, first baseman Matt Olson to shortstop Vaughn Grissom. MJ Melendez scores. Bobby Witt Jr. out at 2nd. Vinnie Pasquantino advances to 2nd, on a missed catch error by pitcher Charlie Morton, assist to shortstop Vaughn Grissom. 1 out
Salvador Perez grounds out softly, catcher Sean Murphy to first baseman Matt Olson. Vinnie Pasquantino to 3rd. 2 outs
Kyle Isbel called out on strikes. 3 outs
